titleStmt.title: Huon d'Auvergne, Bibliteca del seminario vescovile MS 32 (P), Annotations

body.div: mazo "may" Also transcribed by Holtus (2001), pp. 48-50, lines 1-109; Pasinus, 1-10; Peyron 1-16; Graf (1878) 1-72. Rajna here places a description of the miniature: Min. 1. un re (tutto army) e p..t... altre figure; non intendo bene l'imagin/ Yug. dirige un psonag/ porge un breve/ ad un altro ch 'è/ inginocchiato/ forse l'invito di uon a corte Numbers in Rajna's notebook are in pencil, added later. Rajna: 2r. The manuscript began on a recto when he saw it, with 6 lines: 4 followed by a miniature, with two more following it. Here is the beginning of today's MS. <--! 7 needs to be characterized also by Rajan--> fiore "flowers" In Rajna's transcription, "y." somewhat after "el" above the line. cerchare "to look for" Rajna notes "sic" after vevole. Holtus: los. "y" crossed out; Rajna: "caratt. più picc / forte aggiunte fatte / poi –i =" (marginal note). Rajna, note in right margin (sic). B: Anchois le haete la giant d[e] la [con]trie. T seems to be missing the verb, "odia"; an emeded reading might be anzo li (odi)a la zente de la contrà.
